mapper.select: SELECT qz_job_details.JOB_NAME, qz_job_details.JOB_GROUP, qz_job_details.JOB_CLASS_NAME, qz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME, qz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP, qz_triggers.TRIGGER_STATE, qz_cron_triggers.CRON_EXPRESSION, qz_cron_triggers.TIME_ZONE_ID FROM qz_job_details JOIN qz_triggers JOIN qz_cron_triggers ON qz_job_details.JOB_NAME = qz_triggers.JOB_NAME AND qz_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME = qz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_NAME AND qz_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP = qz_cron_triggers.TRIGGER_GROUP
